description: a(n)=T(5,n), array T given by A047848.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = (8^n + 6)/7. - _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 14 2004a(0)= 1, a(1)= 2, a(n)= 9*a(n-1)-8*a(n-2) for n>1. G.f.: (1-7x)/(1-9x+8x^2). [_Philippe Deléham_, Oct 05 2009]a(n) = 8*a(n-1)-6 (with a(0)=1). [_Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 06 2010]a(n+1) = A226308(3n). - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 24 2014
maple: a[0]:=0:a[1]:=1:for n from 2 to 50 do a[n]:=8*a[n-1]+1 od: seq(a[n]+1, n=0..18); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 20 2008
mathematica: s=1;lst={s};Do[s+=2^n;AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 0, 5!, 3}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 07 2008 *)
crossrefs: n-th difference of a(n), a(n-1), ..., a(0) is 7^(n-1) for n=1, 2, 3, ...
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: More terms from _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 07 2008
